alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lowndes; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 12:12PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Lafayette, Jefferson, Taylor, Madison, Lowndes, southeastern Thomas and Brooks Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1211 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Boston to 7 miles west of Madison to 6 miles west of Perry. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Mayo, Perry, Valdosta, Madison, Lake Park, Quitman, Boston, I-75 At Exit 16, Remerton, Dasher, Greenville, Lee, Alma, Pinland, Everett, Pinetta, Drifton, Scanlon and Lovett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
